檾字的基本解释

檾
qǐng
同“苘”。

檾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐng］
［《廣韻》去潁切，上静，溪。］
［《廣韻》口迥切，上迥，溪。］
苘麻。

檾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檾； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页559第04
【唐韻】去穎切【集韻】【韻會】犬潁切【正韻】丘潁切，?音頃。【說文】枲屬。从?聲。【爾雅翼】檾高四五尺，或六七尺，葉似苧而薄，實如大麻子，今人績爲布。或作䔛。【周禮·天官·典枲麻草註】草葛檾也。　又【唐本草】作莔。莔麻，一名白麻。　又【唐韻】口迥切，音褧。義同。

檾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檾字的起名意思

同“苘”，一种高的一年生草本苘麻属植物。

Abutilon
Basic explanation of words
Abutilon
qǐng
Same as "Abutilon".
Abutilon
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qǐng］
["Guangyun" goes to Yingqie, Shangjing, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" mouth is cut, Shangjiong, creek. ]
Abutilon.
Abutilon
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　苘; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 559 04
[Tang Yun] Go to Yingqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Dog Ying-cut [Zheng Yun] Qiu Ying-cut, and the sound is full. [Said the text] is a genus. From?  sound. [Erya Wing] Abutilon is four or five feet tall, or six or seven feet tall, and its leaves are like ramie but thin, like hemp seeds. Today's people are cloth. Or do it. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Dian Gao Ma Cao Annotation] Cao Pu also.　[Tang Materia Medica] as a 莔. Nucifera, a white hemp.　[Tang Yun] The mouth is very cut, and the sound is fascinating. The same meaning.
